actionable_tasks.title: Implement Circuit Breaker Pattern for Provider Failover
actionable_tasks.description: Add a circuit breaker mechanism to the backend provider selection logic to automatically failover to a healthy provider when the current one is unresponsive or error-prone. This improves system resilience and reliability.
implementation_steps: Create a utility module (e.g., circuitBreaker.js) implementing the circuit breaker logic (open/half-open/closed states, error thresholds, reset timeouts).
Integrate the circuit breaker into providerManager.js so that each provider instance is wrapped and monitored.
Update provider selection logic to check circuit breaker state before routing requests.
Write unit tests to simulate provider failures and verify failover behavior.

actionable_tasks.title: Add Request Correlation IDs for End-to-End Tracing
actionable_tasks.description: Attach a unique correlation ID to each incoming request and propagate it through backend services and logs to enable traceability and easier debugging.
implementation_steps: Add middleware to generate and attach a correlation ID (e.g., UUID) to each request (req.headers, req.context).
Ensure all logs and downstream service calls include the correlation ID.
Update logger utility to automatically include correlation IDs in log entries.
Write tests to verify correlation ID propagation.

actionable_tasks.title: Expand Automated Test Coverage
actionable_tasks.description: Increase automated test coverage for critical backend modules, focusing on provider switching, chat pipeline, and analytics endpoints.
implementation_steps: Identify untested or under-tested modules using coverage reports.
Write additional unit and integration tests for provider switching and chat context handling.
Add tests for analytics endpoints (e.g., MongoDB stats, health checks).
Run tests and verify increased coverage.

actionable_tasks.title: Optimize Dockerfile for Multi-Stage Builds and Caching
actionable_tasks.description: Refactor the existing Dockerfile(s) to use multi-stage builds, reducing image size and improving build cache efficiency for faster CI/CD pipelines.
implementation_steps: Refactor Dockerfile to separate build and runtime stages (e.g., install dependencies, build app, copy artifacts).
Leverage Docker cache by ordering COPY and RUN instructions for optimal reuse.
Test build locally and in CI to ensure functionality and reduced image size.
Update docker-compose.yml if necessary.

actionable_tasks.title: Complete Spotify Authentication Interface (Frontend)
actionable_tasks.description: Finish the implementation of the Spotify OAuth authentication UI, ensuring smooth user login and token handling.
implementation_steps: Implement the OAuth login button and redirect flow in SpotifyAuth.js.
Handle token exchange and storage securely in auth.js.
Update Login.js to display authentication status and error handling.
Test the full authentication flow in development.
